alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; Kingfisher; Logan; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 7:29AM CDT until July 07 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KINGFISHER...NORTHEASTERN GRADY...OKLAHOMA... NORTHWESTERN CLEVELAND...SOUTHERN LOGAN...EASTERN CANADIAN AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 729 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cashion to near Oklahoma City to 6 miles northeast of Union City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, western Norman, Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, El Reno, Guthrie, Newcastle, Kingfisher, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Tuttle, Piedmont, Spencer, and Nichols Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; Kingfisher; Logan; McClain; Oklahoma
